name: ESEMPE 2
description:
PERINGATAN!!!! 

KEGIATAN DALAM GAME INI JANGAN DITIRU

INI HANYALAH KARYA FIKTIF!! 

Game ini adalah sikuel dari game sebelum nya yaitu game ESEMPE dan ini adalah game ESEMPE 2 yap ada beberapa perubahan di game ini  yang sebelum nya di game ESEMPE 1 belum ada bercerita tentang gafli yang sudah naik kelas 9 dia pun mulai menjadi anak nakal yang terlewat batas atas suruhan radit teman kelas 8 nya 

game ini saya buat dalam men Developing kan selama kurang lebih 4 hari 

English subtitle

WARNING!!!! ACTIVITIES IN THIS GAME DO NOT BE IMITATED THIS IS JUST A FICTIVE WORKS!! This game is a sequel to the previous game, namely the ESEMPE game and this is the ESEMPE 2 game, yep, there are several changes in this game, previously in the ESEMPE 1 game there was no story about gafli who had gone up to grade 9, he started to become a naughty boy who crossed the line. at the behest of his 8th grade friend radit I made this game for men. Developed it for about 4 days
